title: Critical DB Parameters / Kritik Veritabanı Parametreleri
description: Reviews critical Oracle database initialization parameters that affect performance, memory, and stability

queries.sql: SELECT NAME, VALUE, TYPE, ISDEFAULT FROM V$PARAMETER WHERE NAME IN ('processes', 'open_cursors', 'db_recovery_file_dest_size', 'memory_target', 'sga_target', 'pga_aggregate_target') ORDER BY NAME

doc_hint: Verify that memory parameters (sga_target, pga_aggregate_target) are appropriate for workload size. Check processes and open_cursors limits aren't being hit.
analysis_prompt: List current critical parameter settings. Highlight any that use default values. Recommend adjustments based on typical EBS workload patterns.
